description: Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii f. atropurpurea 'Bagatelle') is an amazing shrub for any landscape. It has beautiful reddish-purple foliage that deepens in color in the winter, making it an excellent choice for a year-round interest in any garden. The shrub is also great for creating a natural hedge, as it has dense and thick branches. Growing up to three to four feet tall and wide, it's a slow-growing shrub that can reflect light even in shady areas - perfect for adding a splash of color around your garden! On top of that, it's a hardy and low-maintenance shrub that doesn't need much pruning or pest-control. All in all, 'Bagatelle' Japanese barberry is a stunning addition to any garden that is sure to bring lots of color and life!
